section.title: Overview
section.p: All the FTP server administrative tasks can be performed using remote admin user interface. We can also use SITE command to do that. You can start the admin console using java -jar ftp-admin.jar.
The admin UI uses RMI to connect to the server. It also displays the server real-time data.
